body.name: AUEDROT Mouse Jiggler Undetectable Mouse Jiggers USB Mouse Mover with Switch Button, Automatic Mouse Wiggler with 2 Jiggle Modes, Mouse Mover Device, Plug & Play, Keep Computer/Laptop Awake, Rose Gold
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 11 hrs 56 mins
features: [2 JIGGLER MODES FREELY SWITCH] -- This device has "Slight Jiggler Mode" and "Random Jiggler Mode" 2 jiggler modes. Slight jiggler mode: move the mouse pointer slightly 1-2 pixels back and forth from left to right, which doesn't even affect the normal use of mice. Random jiggler mode: randomly move the mouse pointer irregularly. Both jiggler modes can keep the computer awake.

[RECOGNIZED AS A TRUSTED DEVICE] -- When this mini mouse jiggler is connected to the computer for the first time, it is recognized as a "USB Composite Device", or rather, the same as an external mouse. So don't worry about it being recognized as an unknown/unsafe device by the computer, unless your computer does not allow access to the mouse.

[METAL MATERIAL WITH SWITCH BUTTON] -- This mouse jiggler is made of aluminum alloy, which is more upscale and sturdy than plastic. With the on/off/modes switch button, "Short Press" to turn on/switch between "Slight Jiggler Mode" and "Random Jiggler Mode", "Long Press" to turn off. The indicator lights on/off indicating that the mouse jiggler is turned on/off.

[NO SOFTWARE INSTALLATION REQUIRED] -- This mouse jiggler does not need to install any software/programs, just plug it into the USB port of the computer, "Short Press" the "Switch Button" to turn on and switch between the 2 jiggler modes, "Long Press" to turn it off. No need to plug and unplug frequently, prevent damage to the computer, easy to use for anyone.

[WITH WIDE APPLICABILITY] -- This mouse jiggler is used in many applications, like online meetings, games online, online reading, remote connection, etc. It keeps the computer active, thereby keeping your Microsoft Teams, Skype, Webex, Lync, etc. "Green". Compatible with most operating systems on the market, Windows XP/7/8/10/11, Mac OS, Android System, etc.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: With 2 Jiggler Modes Freely Switchable Slight Jiggler Mode Slightly moves the mouse pointer by 1-2 pixels left and right, which is almost invisible and doesn't affect the normal use of the mouse. Random Jiggler Mode Randomly moves the mouse pointer across the screen, which is excellent for users who want to see the visible movement of the mouse pointer.

The combination of technology and beauty Auedrot metal mouse jiggler, aluminum alloy material, high-grade and durable. Recognized as a Trusted Device The mouse jiggler is recognized as a "USB Composite Device", rather than any unknown/unsafe device, so you can use it with confidence unless your company's computer doesn't allow the use of a mouse. No Need To Install Any Software This mouse jiggler is plug-and-play, just plug it into the computer's USB port and it will turn on automatically. And this device doesn't have any function of reading/storing data, just press the button to switch modes and turn off.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Flawlessly Does the Job!
reviews.reviewText: The AUEDROT USB Mouse Mover works fantastically. It's immediately recognized on connection. It has yet to fail or stop moving the cursor after days of near continuous use. It's multiple modes, and sleep function make it painless to utilize. A great value for the money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Title: Mouse Jiggler Review - The Ultimate Solution for Inactivity Woes!
reviews.reviewText: As an avid computer user, I cannot stress enough how essential Mouse Jiggler has become in my daily life. This ingenious device has proven to be an absolute game-changer, providing a hassle-free solution to prevent inactivity-related inconveniences and frustrations.The Mouse Jiggler works amazingly well! It boasts a seamless setup process - just plug it in, and you're good to go. No complex software installations or configurations are required. This simplicity ensures that anyone, regardless of their technical prowess, can enjoy its benefits immediately.What makes the Mouse Jiggler truly remarkable is its ability to mimic human-like mouse movements. This nifty little gadget ensures your computer remains active even during periods of idleness, preventing screensavers and sleep modes from interrupting your workflow. This is particularly useful during long video conferences, presentations, and any other tasks where continuous activity is necessary.Moreover, I've found Mouse Jiggler to be an excellent tool for maintaining productivity while working from home. With this tiny device plugged in, I no longer have to worry about the inconvenience of having to log in repeatedly due to my computer's auto-lock feature. It has significantly improved my workflow efficiency and saved me countless minutes each day.Beyond its practicality, the Mouse Jiggler also excels in its unobtrusiveness. It operates silently in the background, and its compact size means it doesn't take up unnecessary space on my desk. Additionally, it's incredibly energy-efficient, consuming minimal power while providing maximum benefits.Another fantastic aspect is its compatibility with various operating systems. Whether you're using Windows, macOS, or Linux, Mouse Jiggler ensures a seamless experience across platforms, further contributing to its versatility and widespread usability.Lastly, I must commend the customer support provided by the Mouse Jiggler team. They were prompt in addressing my queries and exhibited a genuine commitment to ensuring customer satisfaction.In conclusion, Mouse Jiggler is nothing short of amazing. Its flawless performance, ease of use, and practicality make it an indispensable tool for anyone who spends a significant amount of time in front of a computer. Whether you're a professional, student, or even a casual user, I highly recommend the Mouse Jiggler to enhance your computing experience and bid farewell to idle frustrations once and for all!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great! Easy set up.
reviews.reviewText: It's great! This keeps my computer from going to sleep. My company has a 15 minute timeout and it puts the computer to sleep. I work at home so no one has access to my computer. I have 3 screens with over 10 windows open. If it goes to sleep, when it wakes up all of the windows are moved to one screen. With this it doesn't go to sleep. I don't have to do anything. I plugged it in and it comes on in single pixel mode and I just leave like that all day. I don't even turn it off when I am using it. For what I do, being 1 pixel off doesn't matter. I hardly notice it's there.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars LOVE LOVE LOVE This!
reviews.reviewText: I use this product when I am on call but away from my laptop. I carry my phone with me if someone needs me. I need them to know I'm available. Plug and play, as advertised. Button turns it on and off. I see some reviews where people are pissed that they turn it on, but can't continue to work because the mouse pointer is jiggling all over the place (seriously, that's their complaint). You don't use this while you're on your computer working. You use it when you're NOT actively working on the computer, but need your Teams status to show you're available. I've had mine for 3 years, no issues. It may be detectable by the IT department, but I would be happy to explain to IT, or anyone else, why I have it. I highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for quiet quitters or overemployment!
reviews.reviewText: Keeps your teams status as active. Minimal movement setting works perfect. No set up at all just plug and play. Press the button and you could switch settings. Never write reviews for anything on Amazon but this works perfect.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Simple, Cheap, Works Right
reviews.reviewText: I needed this because the management software kept changing the sleep timer on my laptop to go to sleep in less than three minutes (or so it seemed) so I was always having to wake it up and log in again. It has three modes, one that moves the mouse by just one pixel and back again about once a minute. One that moves the mouse a lot about once a minute. The last mode is simply off.This does it for me. I leave it plugged into a hub all the time where I can see the little indicator LED that tells me what mode it's in. Sure, I'm cheating the sleep timer, but that's really the whole point isn't it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Only Lasted 1 year
reviews.reviewText: Super cheap and worked great until I had it for a year and 1 month now it doesn’t do anything. All it did was sit on my desk or be plugged into my computer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars reliable and if anything TOO small and unobtrusive
reviews.reviewText: effective, barely moves cursor so it can be used for most things while the jiggler is engaged, and SMALL (which makes it very easy to forget).

Buen producto, cumple con lo descrito, tiene 2 funciones, 1 velocidad donde mueve bastante el puntero con un matron reperitivo, la segunda mueve el puntero de izquierda a derecha aproximadamente 1-2 pixeles, lo que me parece muy útil ya qué siempre lo tengo conectado de este modo y no requiero estar conectándolo o desconectandolo, aveces olvidó que esta conectadoEl material no es tan bueno como esperaba, me da la impresión que en algún momento se va a romper cuando trate de desconectarloDe ahí en fuera lo recomiendo totalmente
Works well! Easy to use and set up
Sencillo de usar y muy funcional.
This mouse jiggler works great! Totally recommended!
Tried other mouse jigglers prior to this one that never seemed to work. This one is simply plug in and go. Works like a dream. Would highly recommend.
